Shortcodes allow for consistent application of special formatting and components across the documentation. What Are Shortcodes? Shortcodes are special Hugo constructs that provide a simple way to extend Markdown’s capabilities. They allow for inserting complex content or formatting without resorting to HTML, ensuring consistency across the documentation.
